name: File Venture
description:
The first game created in my 52 weeks of games (in which I try to make one game every week)

you take on the role of a spaceship that travels down YOUR computers file system. Every file encountered becomes an enemy.

Once you reach a leaf (dead end) in the file system the game ends

you can press "Esc" to quit and "R" to reset

the ship is controlled using the "WASD" buttons to move and the mouse to aim and shoot

this game has only been tested on windows but should work on mac and linux

no files were harmed in the making of this game

all music and sound effects were obtained through creative commons attribution licence(s)

main theme: Interstellar by sawsquarenoise

http://freemusicarchive.org/mu...

sfx: Explosion03.wav and Laser01.wav by jeremysykes
